text: The [[Valaes Tairn]] take great pride in their skill with the scimitar and [[double scimitar|double-bladed scimitar]]. Foremost among their swordsmen is an order of blade specialists known as the //jaeldira//, or "blade dancers." These are monks who whirl their blades in a bewildering and graceful dance, performed according to their own rhythm.
title: jaeldira
